svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
February 24, 2024" date: "2024-02-24"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
* Mainnet shadow fork successfully upgraded to Dencun, tested blobs with each EL/CL
pair and MEV relayers
Mainnet shadow fork successfully upgraded to Dencun, tested blobs with each EL/CL pair
and MEV relayers
* Client releases for mainnet Dencun upgrade , update your nodes Consensus layer:
Lighthouse v5.0.0 Lodestar v1.16.0 Nimbus v24.2.1 Prysm v5.0.0 Teku v24.2.0 Execution
layer: Besu v24.1.2 Erigon v2.58.1 Otterscan v2.4.0 alpha : adds blob info Geth
v1.13.13 Nethermind v1.25.4 Reth v0.1.0-alpha.19
Client releases for mainnet Dencun upgrade , update your nodes
* Consensus layer: Lighthouse v5.0.0 Lodestar v1.16.0 Nimbus v24.2.1 Prysm v5.0.0 Teku
Consensus layer:
* Lighthouse v5.0.0
Lighthouse v5.0.0

Lodestar v1.16.0

Nimbus v24.2.1

Prysm v5.0.0
* Teku

* Execution layer: Besu v24.1.2 Erigon v2.58.1 Otterscan v2.4.0 alpha : adds blob info
Geth v1.13.13 Nethermind v1.25.4 Reth v0.1.0-alpha.19
Execution layer:
* Besu v24.1.2
Besu v24.1.2
* Erigon v2.58.1 Otterscan v2.4.0 alpha : adds blob info
Erigon v2.58.1
* Otterscan v2.4.0 alpha : adds blob info
Geth v1.13.13
* Nethermind v1.25.4
Nethermind v1.25.4
* Reth v0.1.0-alpha.19
Reth v0.1.0-alpha.19
* Dencun interop testing call video
Dencun interop testing call video
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade (meta EIP7600 )
* Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
Electra upgrade scope (small cross layer fork targeting late 2024): peerDAS (EIP7594)
: develop in parallel to Electra Inclusion lists (EIP7547) : speed run proof of
concept to check complexity for Electra ePBS and increase max EB (EIP7251) : unlikely
for Electra Proposed issuance curve adjustment (30% reduction) and case for targeting
staking ratio of 1/4 Light client roadmap : proposes backfill protocol & SSZification
for Electra
* Electra upgrade scope (small cross layer fork targeting late 2024): peerDAS
(EIP7594) : develop in parallel to Electra Inclusion lists (EIP7547) : speed run proof
of concept to check complexity for Electra ePBS and increase max EB (EIP7251) :
unlikely for Electra Proposed issuance curve adjustment (30% reduction) and case for
targeting staking ratio of 1/4 Light client roadmap : proposes backfill protocol &
SSZification for Electra
* peerDAS (EIP7594) : develop in parallel to Electra
peerDAS (EIP7594) : develop in parallel to Electra
* Inclusion lists (EIP7547) : speed run proof of concept to check complexity for
Electra
Inclusion lists (EIP7547) : speed run proof of concept to check complexity for Electra
* ePBS and increase max EB (EIP7251) : unlikely for Electra
ePBS and increase max EB (EIP7251) : unlikely for Electra
* Proposed issuance curve adjustment (30% reduction) and case for targeting staking
ratio of 1/4
Proposed issuance curve adjustment (30% reduction) and case for targeting staking
* Light client roadmap : proposes backfill protocol & SSZification for Electra
Light client roadmap : proposes backfill protocol & SSZification for Electra
Osaka upgrade (meta EIP7607 )
* Shadow fork converted HoleÅ¡ky testnet state to Verkle
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.54% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.54% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Geth 68% supermajority, could cause a
chain split Consensus layer: Prysm 38%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of
finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth 68% supermajority, could cause a chain split
Geth 68% supermajority, could cause a chain split
* Consensus layer: Prysm 38%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 38%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America &
Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America &
Layer 1
* PÃ©ter SzilÃ¡gyi: transaction propagation proposal to produce less nonce gaps
PÃ©ter SzilÃ¡gyi: transaction propagation proposal to produce less nonce gaps
* Erigon: Caplin Archival format for storing Beacon Chain history
Erigon: Caplin Archival format for storing Beacon Chain history
* Missed slot penalties discussion
Missed slot penalties discussion
ePBS (enshrined Proposer-Builder Separation)
* Terence: why you should care about ePBS
Terence: why you should care about ePBS
* Potuz: ePBS design constraints
Potuz: ePBS design constraints
MEV
* MEV-Boost community call video and notes
MEV-Boost community call video and notes
* Flashbots Protect & MEV-Share data published
Flashbots Protect & MEV-Share data published
* Data Always: Latency is money
Data Always: Latency is money
Research
* Analysis of increasing the number of proposers in a single slot
Layer 2
* OP chains Delta upgrade live, adds span batches which reduces fixed costs by over
OP chains Delta upgrade live, adds span batches which reduces fixed costs by over 90%
* ZK grants round to improve ZK Layer 2 ecosystem, $900k in funds from EF, Aztec,
Polygon, Scroll, Taiko & zkSync, applications close March 18
ZK grants round to improve ZK Layer 2 ecosystem, $900k in funds from EF, Aztec,
EIPs/Standards
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7625 : Contract IDs and metadata extension ERC7627 :
Secure messaging protocol ERC7628 : ERC721 balance extension ERC7629 : Unified token
ERC7631 : Dual nature token pair (DN404 hybrid ERC721 & ERC20) ERC7632 : Interfaces
for named token ERC7634 : Limited Transferrable NFT (ERC721 extension) ERC7635 :
Multi-Fungible Token
* ERC7625 : Contract IDs and metadata extension
ERC7625 : Contract IDs and metadata extension
* ERC7627 : Secure messaging protocol
ERC7627 : Secure messaging protocol
* ERC7628 : ERC721 balance extension
ERC7628 : ERC721 balance extension
* ERC7629 : Unified token
ERC7629 : Unified token
* ERC7631 : Dual nature token pair (DN404 hybrid ERC721 & ERC20)
ERC7631 : Dual nature token pair (DN404 hybrid ERC721 & ERC20)
* ERC7632 : Interfaces for named token
ERC7632 : Interfaces for named token
* ERC7634 : Limited Transferrable NFT (ERC721 extension)
ERC7634 : Limited Transferrable NFT (ERC721 extension)
* ERC7635 : Multi-Fungible Token
ERC7635 : Multi-Fungible Token
Stuff for developers
* Fuzz-utils : generate Foundry unit tests from Echidna & Medusa failed properties
Fuzz-utils : generate Foundry unit tests from Echidna & Medusa failed properties
* Hardhat-viem v2 : adds Viem v2
Hardhat-viem v2 : adds Viem v2
* Ether Deck Mk2 (Solidity): optimized contract account
Ether Deck Mk2 (Solidity): optimized contract account
* createXcrunch : find zero-leading/containing/pattern-matching addresses for CreateX
factory
createXcrunch : find zero-leading/containing/pattern-matching addresses for CreateX
* Protolambda: Ethereum libs/tools in Go updated for Dencun & Go v1.21
Protolambda: Ethereum libs/tools in Go updated for Dencun & Go v1.21
* King of the Frame strategy , gas optimizations to lower cost of stealing
King of the Frame strategy , gas optimizations to lower cost of stealing
* Circom-plus (language server): supports go to definition & Circom 2
Circom-plus (language server): supports go to definition & Circom 2
* Cyfrin Updraft courses now public: development, testing, contract security &
auditing
Cyfrin Updraft courses now public: development, testing, contract security & auditing
Security
* Blueberry (lending) exploit front run by c0ffeebabe, 367 ETH returned
Ecosystem
* Ethereum Protocol Fellowship study group started, open to everyone
Ethereum Protocol Fellowship study group started, open to everyone
* EF Q4 grantees share $30M in funding
EF Q4 grantees share $30M in funding
Enterprise
* Reddit holds ETH in treasury
Reddit holds ETH in treasury
* City of Buenos Aires releases code for self-sovereign digital identity [Spanish]
City of Buenos Aires releases code for self-sovereign digital identity [Spanish]
Job Listings
* Sr. Developer Relations Manager & Technical Writer at Powerloom
Sr. Developer Relations Manager & Technical Writer at Powerloom
* Nethermind: Distributed Systems Dev Lead & Cryptography Researcher
Nethermind: Distributed Systems Dev Lead & Cryptography Researcher
* Sourcify seek a TypeScript Developer
Sourcify seek a TypeScript Developer
* Executive Assistant wanted by EF to support senior decision makers
Executive Assistant wanted by EF to support senior decision makers
* Solidity: C++ Software Engineer and Programming Language Researcher
Solidity: C++ Software Engineer and Programming Language Researcher
* MetaMask Staking: Staff Software Engineer and Software Engineer
MetaMask Staking: Staff Software Engineer and Software Engineer
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
* Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 11.8 to 198.7 gwei, with 34 gwei average Zero net
issuance currently at 22.5 gwei 8.6k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 11.8 to 198.7 gwei, with 34 gwei average
* Zero net issuance currently at 22.5 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 22.5 gwei
* 8.6k ETH net burn this week
8.6k ETH net burn this week
* ETHUSD : $2,739 - $3,025, currently $2,921
ETHUSD : $2,739 - $3,025, currently $2,921
* ETHBTC : currently 0.058 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.058 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
* Uniswap: Proposal for fees to reward UNI holders that delegate & stake Uniswap v2
live on Arbitrum, OP mainnet & Base
Uniswap:
* Proposal for fees to reward UNI holders that delegate & stake
Proposal for fees to reward UNI holders that delegate & stake
* Uniswap v2
Uniswap v2
* Yuga Labs acquired PROOF , including Moonbirds
Yuga Labs acquired PROOF , including Moonbirds
* Optimism airdrop 4 : NFT deployers on mainnet & OP chains can claim share of 10M OP
Optimism airdrop 4 : NFT deployers on mainnet & OP chains can claim share of 10M OP
Regulation/business/tokens
* Kraken filed to dismiss SEC lawsuit
Kraken filed to dismiss SEC lawsuit
* Roman Storm & Alex Pertsev legal defense fundraiser extended until Mar 15 with new
NFTs
Roman Storm & Alex Pertsev legal defense fundraiser extended until Mar 15 with new
General
* Extractable witness encryption scheme for KZG commitments and efficient Laconic OT
Extractable witness encryption scheme for KZG commitments and efficient Laconic OT
* Circle STARKs : use efficient M31 field for STARKs, StarkWare & Polygon
collaboration
Circle STARKs : use efficient M31 field for STARKs, StarkWare & Polygon collaboration
* LatticeFold : leads to post-quantum secure IVC/PCD/SNARKs, performance competitive
with pre-quantum folding schemes
LatticeFold : leads to post-quantum secure IVC/PCD/SNARKs, performance competitive
* Minimize foreign arithmetic in ZKP Circuits
Minimize foreign arithmetic in ZKP Circuits
* DoS vulnerability in Pedersen DKG implementations used in threshold signature
schemes
DoS vulnerability in Pedersen DKG implementations used in threshold signature schemes
* Apple iMessage end-to-end encryption upgrading to PQ3 (post-quantum cryptography)
Apple iMessage end-to-end encryption upgrading to PQ3 (post-quantum cryptography)
End of service: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-february-24-2024
